enWisdom: One who assists the truth shall be successful
By clinging to the truth, support is received

Wisdom: طَلَبُ التَّعَاوُنِ عَلَى إِقَامَةِ الْحَقِّ دِيَانَةٌ وَأَمَانَةٌ
enWisdom: Seeking assistance to establish the truth is [a sign of] faith and uprightness

Wisdom: ثَلَاثٌ لَا يُسْتَحْيَا مِنْهُنَّ خِدْمَةُ الرَّجُلِ ضَيْفَهُ وَقِيَامُهُ عَنْ مَجْلِسِهِ لِأَبِيهِ وَمُعَلِّمِهِ وَطَلَبُ الْحَقِّ وَإِنْ قَلَّ
enWisdom: Three things that are not to be ashamed of [are]: for a person to serve his guest, and for him to stand up from his place for his father or his teacher, and [for him] to seek the right even if it is little

Wisdom: رَحِمَ اللَّهُ امْرَأً رَأَى حَقّاً فَأَعَانَ عَلَيْهِ وَرَأَى جَوْراً فَرَدَّهُ وَكَانَ عَوْناً بِالْحَقِّ عَلَى صَاحِبِهِ
enWisdom: May Allah have mercy on the person who supports truth when he sees it, repels injustice when he sees it and assists his companion by truth

Wisdom: رَحِمَ اللَّهُ امْرَأً أَحْيَا حَقّاً وَأَمَاتَ بَاطِلًا وَأَدْحَضَ الْجَوْرَ وَأَقَامَ الْعَدْلَ
enWisdom: May Allah have mercy of the person who enlivens the truth, causes falsehood to die, fights against oppression and establishes justice

Wisdom: إِنْ كُنْتُمْ لَا مَحَالَةَ مُتَعَصِّبِينَ فَتَعَصَّبُوا لِنُصْرَةِ الْحَقِّ وَإِغَاثَةِ الْمَلْهُوفِ
enWisdom: If you must be fanatical, then be fanatical in assisting the truth and aiding the aggrieved

Wisdom: إِذَا أَكْرَمَ اللَّهُ عَبْداً أَعَانَهُ عَلَى إِقَامَةِ الْحَقِّ
enWisdom: When Allah honours a servant, He helps him to establish justice

Wisdom: لَوْ لَمْ تَتَخَاذَلُوا عَنْ نُصْرَةِ الْحَقِّ لَمْ تَهِنُوا عَنْ تَوْهِينِ الْبَاطِلِ
enWisdom: If you had not turned away from assisting the truth, you would not have felt weakness in overpowering falsehood
Whoever seeks support from Allah attains a glorious victory

Wisdom: أَخْسَرُ النَّاسِ مَنْ قَدَرَ عَلَى أَنْ يَقُولَ الْحَقَّ وَلَمْ يَقُلْ
enWisdom: The biggest loser is one who is able to speak the truth but still does not speak it

Wisdom: قُولُوا الْحَقَّ تَغْنَمُوا وَاسْكُتُوا عَنِ الْبَاطِلِ تَسْلَمُوا
enWisdom: Speak the truth and you will benefit; do not utter falsehood and you will be safe
One who speaks truthfully is believed

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَحْيَا مِنْ قَوْلِ الْحَقِّ فَهُوَ أَحْمَقُ
enWisdom: One who feels ashamed of speaking the truth is really a fool
Deaf is the ear that does not hear the call [of guidance]

Wisdom: لَا تُمْسِكْ عَنْ إِظْهَارِ الْحَقِّ إِذَا وَجَدْتَ لَهُ أَهْلًا
enWisdom: Do not hold back from presenting the truth when you find those who are worthy of it

Wisdom: لَا خَيْرَ فِي السُّكُوتِ عَنِ الْحَقِّ كَمَا أَنَّهُ لَا خَيْرَ فِي الْقَوْلِ بِالْجَهْلِ
enWisdom: There is no good in remaining silent from the truth just as there is no benefit in speech with ignorance
The most veracious speech is that which conforms to the truth
